mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_stock(pallet_num, product_code) SELECT LPAD(CONVERT(MAX(pallet_num),SIGNED)+1,3,'0') AS pallet_num, #{product_code} AS product_code FROM b_stock
mapper.select: SELECT pallet_num FROM b_stock WHERE product_code = #{data} and stock_num is null
